1663.97.text:
She said, I just want to tell everybody what
God has done for me.

1668.21.text:
This probably isn't a true story, but it's
pretty cool; it illustrates my point.

1675.87.text:
She said I was down to my last 20 dollars,
and I was in church, and I felt like God told

1684.33.text:
me to put the 20 dollars in the offering,
and so I did it.

1688.95.text:
She said, but the problem was I didn't have
any food at the house.

1694.19.text:

God, so I put my money in the offering.

1700.44.text:
And I went back home, and when I went home,
my refrigerator had been empty before I left.

1802.75.text: And I went back into the house singing.
